name: The Four Eyed Creature
description:
PLAY IN BROWSER

Windows  -  OSX  - LINUX

The game had a small but significant bug making half of the game unplayable which was corrected few seconds after the deadline.

_______

Made for the GMTK Jam 2018 - Genre without mechanic

This game is a FPS without aim.

_______

You are an alien with 4 eyes who just crashed his spaceship on a planet. Hopefully you find a garage which propose a new one to whoever is able to finish their new deadly escape room.

_______

Credits:

Aurelien Montero - Sound design & Music
Antoine Semblat - Everything else
